custom_part_types.description: The custom part types used in this exam

diagnostic_topic_names.description: The names of the topics used in diagnostic exams that this question belongs to

BuiltinConstants.description: Specify which builtin constants should be enabled

e.description: Whether the constant e is enabled

i.description: Whether the constant i is enabled-

pi.description: Whether the constant pi is enabled

tex.description: The tex code use to display the constant

Extensions.description: Specify which extensions should be enabled

answer_marks.description: Map points to strings of answers ! use anchors in yaml

items.description: Items for which the answer can be selected

css.description: The CSS to add to the outputfiles

js.description: The JavaScript to add to the outputfiles

can_regenerate.description: Whether the student can regenerate the question Old name was `allow_regenerate`

confirm_when_leaving.description: Whether the student will be asked to confirm when leaving the exam.

show_title_page.description: Whether the title page should be shown. Old name was `show_frontpage`

sort_answers.description: Whether the answers should be sorted

has_to_select_option.description: Whether the student has to select an option (if false: can submit without selecting)

wrong_nb_answers_warning_type.description: What to do if the student picks the wrong number of responses? Either "none" (do nothing), "prevent" (don’t let the student submit), or "warn" (show a warning but let them submit)
What to do if the student picks the wrong number of responses? Either "none" (do nothing), "prevent" (don’t let the student submit), or "warn" (show a warning but let them submit)

mark_partial_by_cells.description: If this is set to true, the student will be awarded marks according to the proportion of cells that are marked correctly. If this is not ticked, they will only receive the marks for the part if they get every cell right. If their answer does not have the same dimensions as the correct answer, they are always awarded zero marks.

max_absolute_deviation.description: If the absolute difference between the student’s value for a particular cell and the correct answer’s is less than this value, then it will be marked as correct.

max.description: The maximal size, if this is none, there is no limit

TranslatableString.description:
A translatable string

In yaml it should be specified as either - a simple string: "this is a string" - a file string: file:<path> - A map that maps locales on formattables strings and parts like "{func}" (between {}) to values.

anyOf.description: Maps locales on formattable strings and parts like "{func}" (between {}) to values

VariableTemplateType.description: The different template_types for a variable
